name: Fight Mania 3D
description:
The punch boxing game warrior & Kung Fu Karate Fighter game is especially designed for kung Fu karate fighting and punch boxing lovers from around the fighting world. The punch boxing superstar & fighting star fight career challenges in devastating punches world champion. Easy gameplay of tactically rich fighting simulation now, use the touch gestures and your quickness and fighting technique will make you a great champion.

Test new striking techniques and world dangerous ninja Kung skills like karate kicks and boxing punches and jumping art of fighting in world wrestling competition game. Beat all tag rivals in this real ninja punch boxing experience and world wrestling competition game and become universal hero of real kick fighting games. In this face ninja warrior punch boxing game enemies be stronger so train yourself prove your strength as a strongest fighter
